column16:
'<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<root>
  <dynamic-element name="header" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="subheader" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="image" type="image"/>
  <dynamic-element name="content" type="text_box"/>
  <dynamic-element name="more-url" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="button-name" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="button-id" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="footer" type="text_area"/>
</root>'

column11: a right and left content panel
column13:
'<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<root>
  <dynamic-element name="general-header" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="left-panel-header" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="left-panel-content" type="text_area"/>
  <dynamic-element name="right-panel-header" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="right-panel-content" type="text_area"/>
  <dynamic-element name="footer" type="text_area"/>
</root>'

column10: 'A basic article that features a header
column15:
'<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<root>
  <dynamic-element name="header" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="header-link" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="open-header-link-in-new-window" type="boolean"/>
  <dynamic-element name="date" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="type" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="image" type="image"/>
  <dynamic-element name="image-link" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="open-image-link-in-new-window" type="boolean"/>
  <dynamic-element name="flow" type="list">
    <dynamic-element name="default" type="default"></dynamic-element>
    <dynamic-element name="left" type="left"></dynamic-element>
    <dynamic-element name="right" type="right"/>
  </dynamic-element>
  <dynamic-element name="content" type="text_area"/>
</root>'

column10: 'Content surrounded by a single div tag for easy customization.'

column11:
'<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<root>
  <dynamic-element name="sidebar-location" type="list">
    <dynamic-element name="right" type="right"></dynamic-element>
    <dynamic-element name="left" type="left"/>
  </dynamic-element>
  <dynamic-element name="sidebar-content" type="text_area"/>
  <dynamic-element name="main-content" type="text_area"/>
</root>'

column10: 'A header designed to mimic the portlet''s title.'

column11:

<root>

  <dynamic-element name="rss-link" type="text"/>
  <dynamic-element name="rss-description" type="text_box"/>
</root>'

</root>'
